meanings.definition: Not belonging to or characteristic of a community.
meanings.sent1: The new playground equipment brought joy to the noncommunity park.
meanings.sent2: The isolated cabin in the woods was a noncommunity place.
meanings.sent3: The noncommunity garden gnome decided to go on an adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her noncommunity spirit was like a lone wolf in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The noncommunity atmosphere of the desert was both eerie and peaceful.

meanings.definition: A group of people who do not share common interests or values.
meanings.sent1: The noncommunity gathered at the library for different reasons.
meanings.sent2: The noncommunity of students preferred to study alone.
meanings.sent3: The noncommunity picnic turned into a comedy of errors.
meanings.sent4: The workplace felt like a noncommunity of mismatched puzzle pieces.
meanings.sent5: The noncommunity of travelers bonded over their love for adventure.
